title: Executive Management and Organizational Learning: Knowledge Creation Strategies in Short-term Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of organizational management theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course for corporate managers/leaders, emphasizing analysis of organizational learning mechanisms through executive management case studies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain organizational learning processes (shared mental models, dialogue, knowledge creation) by analyzing executive management (IM) cases.
Learners can design organizational culture change strategies under the temporal constraints and uncertainty conditions of executive management.
Learners can measure individual learning outcomes and derive improvement directions through formative assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
